body_html:
The graph has been created beforehand, but I'm not modifying it (at least not deliberately!).
I'm not sure which line in set_all_variable_values you are talking about:

for var in self.sess.graph.get_collection(tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_VARIABLES):

This one is to just go through all the variables, and this

self.sess.run(var.assign(update_dict[var.name]))

just replaces their value.

body:
The graph has been created beforehand, but I'm not modifying it (at least not deliberately!).
I'm not sure which line in `set_all_variable_values` you are talking about:

```
for var in self.sess.graph.get_collection(tf.GraphKeys.TRAINABLE_VARIABLES):
```

This one is to just go through all the variables, and this 

```
self.sess.run(var.assign(update_dict[var.name]))
```

just replaces their value.
